General.Name: Prestige Biologics Co. Ltd.
General.Description: Prestige Biologics Co., Ltd. specializes in the development and production of biologic agents and biosimilars. Its product candidates include Herceptin for breast and stomach cancer; Avastin for colon, lung, and ovarian cancers; Humira for arthritis; PBP1510 for pancreatic cancer; Denosumab for bone loss, osteoporosis; Aflibercept for macular edema and metastatic colorectal cancer; Eculizumab for atypical haemolytic uremic syndrome; Ipilimumab for metastatic melanoma; and PBP1710 for solid tumors. Prestige Biologics Co., Ltd. was formerly known as PrestigeBio Pharmaceuticals and changed its name to Prestige Biologics Co., Ltd. in October 2019. The company was founded in 2015 and is based in Cheongju-si, South Korea.
